name: Scorpion

debut.context: Appears in the Arabasta desert as a bounty hunter attempting to capture Ace

keyMoments.description: Lures Ace into a confrontation by claiming to have defeated Blackbeard
Battles Ace using various weapons including the Prescorraci Rifle
Is saved by Ace when a landslide threatens him and his sons
Reveals his true motivation was to inspire his sons by challenging a powerful warrior

notes: Scorpion is a filler character who appears only in Episode 101. Despite being an antagonist, he demonstrates admirable values in wanting to inspire his sons to pursue their dreams. He lives in the badlands of Arabasta.

name: Chip

debut.context: Introduced as one of Scorpion's two sons living in the Arabasta badlands

keyMoments.description: Nearly dies in a landslide but is saved by Ace's Hiken technique
Witnesses his father's philosophy about challenging powerful opponents

notes: Chip is a minor filler character, one of Scorpion's two sons. He serves as motivation for his father's actions in the episode.

name: Dip

debut.context: Introduced as one of Scorpion's two sons living in the Arabasta badlands

keyMoments.description: Nearly dies in a landslide but is saved by Ace's Hiken technique
Witnesses his father's philosophy about challenging powerful opponents

notes: Dip is a minor filler character, one of Scorpion's two sons. He serves as motivation for his father's actions in the episode.

name: Popo

debut.context: Appears as Scorpion's ostrich-like bird companion in the Arabasta desert

keyMoments.description: Accompanies Scorpion as he observes and confronts Ace

notes: Popo is described as an ostrich-like bird wearing a helmet. He is Scorpion's mount and companion, typical of the desert animals seen in Arabasta.

name: Portgas D. Ace
nameJapanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.description: Battles Scorpion after hearing he claimed to defeat Blackbeard
Uses Hiken to save Scorpion and his sons from a landslide
Gives Luffy his Vivre Card before departing
Departs from the Straw Hat crew to continue hunting Blackbeard

abilities.name: Hiken (Fire Fist)
abilities.description: Ace's signature technique where he launches a powerful column of fire shaped like a fist

relationships.description: Sworn brother - gives Luffy his Vivre Card to help them reunite in the future

notes: In this episode, Ace demonstrates his combat abilities and compassionate nature. The Vivre Card he gives Luffy becomes one of the most important items in the series, guiding Luffy during the Impel Down and Marineford arcs. This is the last time Luffy sees Ace before their reunion in Impel Down.

name: Monkey D. Luffy

keyMoments.description: Receives Ace's Vivre Card and learns how it works
Says goodbye to Ace as he departs to hunt Blackbeard

relationships.description: Sworn brother - receives Ace's Vivre Card to help them reunite

notes: This episode establishes Luffy's possession of Ace's Vivre Card, which becomes crucial in the Impel Down arc when Luffy uses it to navigate to Ace's location and monitor his condition.
